resources.string: "A great app for video and image content, Download it from here https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.x.nocrap"
We are working on some great feature of the app. Will release ASAP.\nTHANKS

Please select at least one item
Do you want to remove this content from your likes.
Tell us why do you want to report this content.\nPlease add you\'r Email if necessary.
Please wait, Video hasn\'t loaded yet
The paw tab shows videos related to Animals and Nature.
The footprint tab shows videos related to Humans, Science etc.
The Lotus(Flower) tab shows Images that amaze you.
The heart icon is for liking the content. You can see your liked content on liked list later.
The Up-Arrow shows the details about content like Title, Likes, Views and the creditor info.
A little introduction to the App
Below are some instructions will help you to get familiar with the app functionality more easily.
Enable All Notification for the app
